casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Arthur Larome JEMISON, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157812
COA: 334024 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 8, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the motion of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing his brief is GRANTED. The brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before May 8, 2019.
